1.title: The Ghost and the Grotto

episode of.title: Get a Room with Carson & Thom (TV Series 2018– )

1.plot: Interior Designer Thom Filicia and his bestie, Fashion Guru, Carson Kressley take on homeowners Sherrie & Dave, who want to turn their vast living room and grotto into a fun but functional family space. However, decorating becomes a challenge with a client who proves to be the most indecisive person in New York! Meanwhile they have to navigate a unique scenario with their second client, Zenobia, a psychic living with the ghost of her dead mother-in-Law, Mrs. O'Connell, who has opinions of her own!

2.title: Designer Demands and Big Boy Plans

episode of.title: Get a Room with Carson & Thom (TV Series 2018– )

2.plot: Thom and Carson are given a run for their money when they take on Kenyatta, a former interior designer, who has a problem letting go of control.

6.title: Sofa Hang Ups and Design Shake Ups

episode of.title: Get a Room with Carson & Thom (TV Series 2018– )

6.plot: Powerhouse couple, Jessica and Josh hire Thom and Carson to design their Tribeca loft space, with one big challenge they must design around. Will Thom and Carson be able to work around this stumbling block or will it all come crashing down? Meanwhile the guys take on a project with Nichole, a widow, who wants a fresh start while honoring her husband in the home they once shared together.

imdb.plot outline: Carson Kressley and Thom Filicia are here to help fight the uniformity and ubiquity of American home design. Thom takes Carson under his wing to teach him interior design by channeling Carson's impeccable sense for fashion. The duo will create breathtaking and affordable home redesigns for their lucky clients using expert skills mixed with their signature endearing charm fans fell in love with during Queer Eye for the Straight Guy.
imdb.title: Get a Room with Carson & Thom
akas: Get a Room with Carson & Thom (United States)
plot: Carson Kressley and Thom Filicia are here to help fight the uniformity and ubiquity of American home design. Thom takes Carson under his wing to teach him interior design by channeling Carson's impeccable sense for fashion. The duo will create breathtaking and affordable home redesigns for their lucky clients using expert skills mixed with their signature endearing charm fans fell in love with during Queer Eye for the Straight Guy.
